segments.text: What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There were charges on my debit card that I never made .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a statement for your debit card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which charges are you talking about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s the last four charges .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ re going to have to do an investigation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that going to take long ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m not sure , but in the meantime we will freeze these charges .
segments.speaker: S1
